statements: SELECT * FROM course_material;
SELECT course_name, lecture_notes FROM course_material WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM course_material WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM course_material WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT presentations FROM course_material WHERE course_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM course_material;
SELECT course_name, lecture_notes FROM course_material WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, presentations FROM course_material WHERE course_id > 3 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM course_material WHERE course_name LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT course_name, lecture_notes, presentations FROM course_material WHERE course_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM LectureNotes WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Presentations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT presentation_title FROM Presentations WHERE course_id = 205;
SELECT course_id, presentation_title FROM Presentations WHERE id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY lecture_title DESC;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM LectureNotes WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS total_lectures FROM LectureNotes GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT course_id, AVG(id) AS average_lecture_id FROM LectureNotes GROUP BY course_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Presentations WHERE presentation_title LIKE '%Database%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, note_content FROM LectureNotes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, presenter_name FROM Presentations WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(created_at) AS latest_date FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT id, material_type, material_content FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT presenter_name, presentation_file FROM Presentations ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT course_id, material_type FROM CourseMaterials WHERE material_type = 'slides' LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, note_content FROM LectureNotes WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS total_notes FROM LectureNotes GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes;
SELECT note_title, note_content FROM LectureNotes WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_id FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT presentation_title FROM Presentations WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM LectureNotes WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT presentation_title, presentation_file_path FROM Presentations WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT note_title, note_content FROM LectureNotes WHERE note_id = 3;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Courses WHERE course_name = 'History';
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterial;
SELECT course_id, course_name, lecture_notes FROM CourseMaterial ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT lecturer_name, department FROM Lecturers WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, major FROM Students WHERE major = 'Mathematics';
SELECT assignment_desc, due_date FROM Assignments ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourseMaterial;
SELECT course_id, course_name, lecture_notes FROM CourseMaterial WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT lecturer_name, department FROM Lecturers WHERE department = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY lecturer_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, major FROM Students WHERE major = 'Engineering' ORDER BY student_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enroll_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN CourseMaterial ON Enrollments.course_id = CourseMaterial.course_id;
